Fintan J. Aylward (March 11, 1928 â€“ June 29, 2021) was a politician in Newfoundland and Labrador. He represented Placentia East in the Newfoundland House of Assembly from 1972 to 1975. He was a lawyer and judge. Aylward died in St. John's in 2021 at the age of 93.
